title: Did dozens of countries request COVID-19 tests in 2018?
subtitle: A friendly reminder that COVID-19 was named so, in part, because it was first observed in humans in 2019.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The data presented on the World Bank ' s Integrated Trade Solutions web site in September 2020 showed that dozens of importing or exporting countries of the items named CAVID-19 in 2018 - more than a year before the epidemic occurred and even before CAVID-19 had a name.
